channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: Ok, i just got moparscape and i really really need some help cause im a noob and dont know wtf im doing. Ok i need a huge list of how to enter commands... everyone else has em but they way to complicated. If someone could show me a step by step tutorial with pictures and everything just to show me how to add stuff to the game([b]items, npcs, etc[/b]...) it'd really help. Sorry that im asking this and annoying the hell out of all of you but, i would actually love to know how to add items and npcs to the game by commands. :(

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @gta12321 gta12321
item.description:
@gta12321 wrote:

Ok, i just got moparscape and i really really need some help cause im a noob and dont know wtf im doing. Ok i need a huge list of how to enter commands… everyone else has em but they way to complicated. If someone could show me a step by step tutorial with pictures and everything just to show me how to add stuff to the game(items, npcs, etc…) it’d really help. Sorry that im asking this and annoying the hell out of all of you but, i would actually love to know how to add items and npcs to the game by commands.

Read full topic
